sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPINOSUS caulis, in botany ; a stem covered with strong woody prickles, whole roots are not ſuperficial, but proceeding from the body of the ſtem. When applied to a leaf, ſpinoſum fοlium, it indicates the margin running out into rigid points or prickles, quod margine exit in acumina duriοra, rigida, pungentia.
